scenario_text.value: No, that’s not it. Look at that!
The fog up ahead is really thick.

It is indeed. I’ve tried looking for a way we
might be able to access the dam,

but the whole area seems to be shrouded in
deep fog. I can see no way through.

Something about this fog gives me a really
bad feeling, too... Even worse than usual.

This has gotta be something the Master’s
doing to stop us, right?
But...what is even going on here?
Hm? I heard something just now!

It sounded like it came from the grass over
there. You think maybe it’s Aoi?!

No, Minoru, wait! You shouldn’t approach so
recklessly!
Minoru, get back! It’s an enemy!
